title: LFT Plat Mid/Sup
body:
Looking for a Team mainly semi serious 
my rank is platinum 4 wanting to get better game play wise and team work wise which can go into solo q as i play within teams. I love playing mid lane {{champion:112}} {{champion:34}} {{champion:136}} {{champion:69}} {{champion:45}} can play almost every mid laner and I'm happy to learn more along the way and improve on mid lane champions.
I also play support champions are {{champion:16}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:89}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:40}} {{champion:12}} Also happy to learn many more. 
Free almost every day but as i want to get  job i don't really want to get into serious team as i might not be able to play every night 
Add me in client as i won't really be on the boards tonight. GRS Bruce :) Thank you

replies.body: yo Bruce baby come play for us
